51586.<voice 00621_00051586><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00621_00051586><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>Wow, how pretty... I was just wondering how Janna was
doing.<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51587.<voice 00671_00051587><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00671_00051587><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>...Anlucia. Brace yourself and listen.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51588.<voice 00711_00051588><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00711_00051588><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>It appears Janna has passed away.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51590.<voice 00821_00051590><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00821_00051590><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>It appears that she wandered away from her troupe at
night to go looking for a Wish Flower.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51591.<voice 00851_00051591><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00851_00051591><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>That area is normally supposed to be peaceful and
safe... But...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51592.<voice 00891_00051592><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00891_00051592><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Unfortunately, she was attacked by a vicious monster...
That took her life. This flower... Was the one she
was clutching.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51593.<voice 00951_00051593><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00951_00051593><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>That's a lie......<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75627.<voice 00961_00075627><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00961_00075627><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>...Brother, you're lying!!<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51594.<voice 01011_00051594><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01011_00051594><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>We both had dreams... We promised each other we'd
make our dreams come true!!<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51595.<voice 01044_00051595><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01044_00051595><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Calm down, Anlucia!<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51596.<voice 01114_00051596><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01114_00051596><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>It... It can't be...<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51597.<voice 01161_00051597><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01161_00051597><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>Please... You'll grant my wish, won't you? I'm begging
you... Bring Janna back to life.<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51599.<voice 01356_00051599><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01356_00051599><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>...No matter how much you wish for it, a life lost can
never be returned.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51600.<voice 01396_00051600><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01396_00051600><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>The world will soon be shrouded in darkness.
Whatever fate awaits us...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51601.<voice 01436_00051601><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01436_00051601><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>You must be strong so you won't ever cry again,
Anlucia.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51329.<voice 00345_00051329><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00345_00051329><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>Behind this gate lies the final key to releasing her
sealed memories...<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51330.<voice 00395_00051330><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00395_00051330><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>Beyond this point, lies that girl's most haunting
memory.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51331.<voice 00555_00051331><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00555_00051331><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>Please destroy the guardian over her sealed memories...<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51332.<voice 00862_00051332><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00862_00051332><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>...Even if it takes an eternity, so be it. You must
return her memories to me.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51333.<voice 00655_00051333><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00655_00051333><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>...That girl's fate, I leave to you.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51334.<voice 01989_00051334><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01989_00051334><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>I can no longer fight...<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51335.<voice 02139_00051335><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02139_00051335><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>Dreams shattered, loved ones lost...<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51336.<voice 02324_00051336><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02324_00051336><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>What do you want from me,
someone so empty and alone?<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51337.<voice 02509_00051337><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02509_00051337><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>Still, if you wish to awaken me, I want
you to witness this for yourself...<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51338.<voice 02734_00051338><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02734_00051338><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>There is no such thing as hope in this world,
we wallow in grief and wander around broken,
while an endless despair spreads all around!<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51339.<voice 00040_00051339><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00040_00051339><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001><center>The memories... Are... Returning... Those...
Haunting memories... I sealed... Away...<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51340.<voice 00100_00051340><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00100_00051340><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001><center>I do... Not wish to... See them...
To hear them... I was happier...
Not knowing...<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51341.<voice 00875_00051341><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00875_00051341><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>...And that's the sad story of how that girl created
her own sorrowful guardian to keep her memories
sealed away.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51342.<voice 00905_00051342><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00905_00051342><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>With this, Anlucia's memories will be restored and I
believe now I can reveal my true self.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51343.<voice 00945_00051343><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00945_00051343><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>Nevertheless... If she can accept her painful past, she
can overcome anything.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51344.<voice 00995_00051344><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00995_00051344><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>...Come. Let us meet with her now.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51345.<voice 00355_00051345><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00355_00051345><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>...Are you ready, Anlucia.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51346.<voice 00515_00051346><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00515_00051346><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>I am, Brother. Please come in.<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51347.<voice 00650_00051347><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00650_00051347><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>It's terrible out there... The Great Demon King's army
is right outside the castle.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51348.<voice 00770_00051348><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00770_00051348><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Even the walls of this mighty castle will not hold
much longer. The next battle will be the decisive
one.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51349.<voice 00950_00051349><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00950_00051349><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>So it's finally come...<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51350.<voice 01110_00051350><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01110_00051350><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>I had your sword reworked. It should be stronger than
ever before.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51351.<voice 01290_00051351><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01290_00051351><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>Thank you, Big Brother Toma!<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51352.<voice 01470_00051352><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01470_00051352><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Anlucia. If it were up to me, I wouldn't let you go
to that bloody battlefield, but...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51353.<voice 01797_00051353><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01797_00051353><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>...I've become much stronger. My skill with a sword is just as good as yours. So, not another word about me not coming.<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51354.<voice 01947_00051354><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01947_00051354><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>If it comes down to it, I will protect you!<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51355.<voice 02107_00051355><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02107_00051355><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Good grief, I guess it's a good thing when a princess is
a bit of a tomboy, huh?<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51356.<voice 02227_00051356><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02227_00051356><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Anlucia, just remember one thing.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51357.<voice 02347_00051357><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02347_00051357><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>From here on out, this battle is the real
deal. The slightest mistake could cost you
your life...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51358.<voice 02467_00051358><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02467_00051358><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>So you absolutely cannot worry about
protecting me.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51359.<voice 02587_00051359><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02587_00051359><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>With that sword, you should protect yourself.
Promise me that.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51360.<voice 02757_00051360><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02757_00051360><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>...I promise, Brother.<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51361.<voice 02937_00051361><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02937_00051361><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>I didn't realize how much you have grown... Okay,
let's go.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51363.<voice 00588_00051363><start_lip_sync m5: <voice 00588_00051363><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>...What a fool you are.<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51364.<voice 00693_00051364><start_lip_sync m5:
<voice 00693_00051364><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>I came to see what the descendants of Gran Zedora
had in store for me, but...<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51365.<voice 00803_00051365><start_lip_sync m5:
<voice 00803_00051365><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>You are no match for the Great Demon King! Now,
sacrifice yourself before me!<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51367.<voice 01285_00051367><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01285_00051367><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>The Hero will never fall to a Demon King!<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51370.<voice 01871_00051370><start_lip_sync m5: <voice 01871_00051370><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>Kukukuk... I see now, how ironic.<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51372.<voice 02130_00051372><start_lip_sync m5: <voice 02130_00051372><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>...You, True Hero. I will take your soul.<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51373.<voice 03067_00051373><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03067_00051373><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>...Anlucia. Listen to me.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51374.<voice 03187_00051374><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03187_00051374><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>I have lived my whole life as a substitute for the True
Hero...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51375.<voice 03357_00051375><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03357_00051375><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>...For you, Anlucia.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51376.<voice 03417_00051376><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03417_00051376><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Anlucia... The Hero of Astoltia... I beg you...
Save this world... Please...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51378.<voice 03947_00051378><start_lip_sync m5:
<voice 03947_00051378><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>Heh, heh... Not only did you protect the Hero, but

51379.<voice 04187_00051379><start_lip_sync m5:
<voice 04187_00051379><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>But, your prized hero is a weak-kneed coward... How

76528.<voice 04447_00076528><start_lip_sync m5: <voice 04447_00076528><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>Ughh... That light...!?<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51380.<voice 04662_00051380><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04662_00051380><start_lip_sync n02578 _normal m00001><center>O' Hero... You cannot die here.<stop_lip_animation n02578 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51381.<voice 04727_00051381><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04727_00051381><start_lip_sync n02578 _normal m00001><center>You are the only hope of this world.<stop_lip_animation n02578 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51382.<voice 05097_00051382><start_lip_sync m5: <voice 05097_00051382><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>I will not let you escape, Hero!!<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51383.<voice 00010_00051383><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00010_00051383><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>I can no longer fight...<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51384.<voice 00140_00051384><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00140_00051384><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>I couldn't protect what I wanted to protect, and I

51385.<voice 00260_00051385><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00260_00051385><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>One with such an empty heart couldn't be the Hero.<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51386.<voice 00601_00051386><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00601_00051386><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>Instead of having these thoughts...<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51387.<voice 00641_00051387><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00641_00051387><start_lip_sync n02081 _normal m00001>It would be better to forget about everything.<stop_lip_animation n02081 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51388.<voice 01117_00051388><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01117_00051388><start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>Daaaaaad! There's a pretty girl lying on the ground

51389.<voice 01517_00051389><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01517_00051389><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001><pc>... Am I...?<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51390.<voice 01837_00051390><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01837_00051390><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>Good morning, Anlucia.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51391.<voice 02182_00051391><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02182_00051391><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>Who are you...?<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51392.<voice 02282_00051392><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02282_00051392><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>I've been waiting this whole time for you to awaken.

51394.<voice 02632_00051394><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02632_00051394><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>You may think that I, a substitute for the Hero, fell

51395.<voice 02762_00051395><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02762_00051395><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>That isn't so, Anlucia.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51396.<voice 02922_00051396><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02922_00051396><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>...I was happy. I was proud to be able to protect you.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51397.<voice 03092_00051397><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03092_00051397><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>If I have one regret... It's that I didn't get to see you

52428.<voice 03467_00052428><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03467_00052428><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Now, Anlucia. Please make my dream come true...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52429.<voice 03797_00052429><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03797_00052429><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>...Thank you, Big Brother Toma.<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52430.<voice 03977_00052430><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03977_00052430><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001><center><pc>. Please take care of my little sister for me...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
